Original:

Thinking of the only time to go, a bowl of beef rice with a service fee of 400 is simply the sweetness of steamed meat and dried rice. The 380 bartending even a bubble of the ice cubes is casual.
All cheap assembly cars, the meal is very slow and forget the west. My wife's meals have waited for 50 minutes and didn't come to ask if they were delicious. Do you have something to eat? Are you joking with me?
